name: Bullet Dance (hapuum, owen_lai, alexy)
description:
Bullet Dance is a mix of a top down shooter and a rhythm game created for the 2021 GMTK game jam. Survive waves of enemies while controlling the rhythm game by moving to different parts of the map. The game is launched with 4 different stages with different maps and a unique soundtrack for each area. Collect coins to buy items that can help you beat tough stages, while paying for the frog shopkeeper's crippling student debt (please help him, he is in need of money). Buy illegally smuggled in guns, hearts bought off the black market and a single boot!

Enjoy the game, Good Luck!
